even the most colossal,
disruptive idea
begins with a seed

the event

Sunday, April 24th, 2016


Seeds of Change

TEDxAmherst will host its 2nd annual conference on Sunday April 24th, 2016 in the Lincoln Campus Center Auditorium at the University of Massachusetts Amherst. TEDxAmherst will feature a live audience of over 750 attendees, and showcase a diverse range of speakers from the Pioneer Valley and beyond.
